org.opends.server.tools.dsreplication

Class StatusReplicationUserData

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.opends.server.tools.dsreplication.ReplicationUserData
      • org.opends.server.tools.dsreplication.StatusReplicationUserData

  • public class StatusReplicationUserData
extends ReplicationUserData
    This class is used to store the information provided by the user to show replication configuration. It is required because when we are in interactive mode the ReplicationCliArgumentParser is not enough.
